ftb.client
Class FTB_World

java.lang.Object
  ftb.client.FTB_World

public class FTB_World
extends java.lang.Object

Portal class to Fault Tolerant Backplance (FTB). A client that wishes to send or receive events through FTB should connects to an instance of FTB_World in advance. FTB_World provides all the FTB APIs equivalent (except API for event polling).

Constructor Summary

          Creates an instance of FTB_World.

                                java.lang.String event_name,
                                FTB_Event_Property event_property)
                         throws FTB_Exception
Publishes an event.

Parameters:
client_handle - Client handle of the publishing client.
event_name - Event name.
event_property - Event property that includes payload data.
Returns:
event handle that represents the event sent out.

compare_event_handles

public boolean compare_event_handles(FTB_Event_Handle handle_a,
                                     FTB_Event_Handle handle_b)
Compares two event handles to see whether they represent the same event.

Parameters:
handle_a - The first event handle.
handle_b - The second event handle.
Returns:
true if two event handles are identical,
false otherwise.

subscribe

public FTB_Subscription subscribe(FTB_Client_Handle client_handle,
                                  java.lang.String subscription_str,
                                  FTB_Callable callback,
                                  java.lang.Object arg)
                           throws FTB_Exception
Subscribes to an event.

Parameters:
client_handle - Client handle of the subscribing client.
subscription_str - Subscription string of the event to subscribe.
callback - Interface to receive events for callback.
arg - User-specified argument for the callback.
Returns:
FTB_Subscription that represent this event subscription.
Throws:
FTB_Exception

public int unsubscribe(FTB_Subscription subscription)
Unsubscribes an event.

Parameters:
subscription - FTB_Subscription (subscription handle) of the event to cancel subscription.
Returns:
status code of the unsubscription as defined in FTB_DEF.
